  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2572</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">How Seismic waves are produced duing an earthquake.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie die seismischen Wellen ein Erdbeben duing 
produziert werden.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment des vagues séismiques sont produites 
duing un tremblement de terre.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como as ondas seismic são produzidas que duing 
um terremoto.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come le onde sismiche sono prodotte che duing un 
terremoto.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς τα σεισμικά κύματα παράγονται duing ένας 
σεισμός.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo las ondas sísmicas se producen duing un 
terremoto.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demostrates the 3 types of seismic waves created during an earthquake</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">seismic waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die demostrates die 3 Typen der 
seismischen Wellen während eines Erdbebens erstellten</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation que les demostrates les 3 types de vagues 
séismiques ont créée pendant un tremblement de terre</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que os demostrates os 3 tipos de ondas 
seismic criassem durante um terremoto</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che i demostrates i 3 tipi di onde sismiche
hanno creato durante il terremoto</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που demostrates οι 3 τύποι σεισμικών 
κυμάτων δημιούργησαν κατά τη διάρκεια ενός σεισμού</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que los demostrates los 3 tipos de ondas 
sísmicas crearon durante un terremoto</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">seismische Wellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vagues séismiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ondas seismic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">onde sismiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σεισμικά κύματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ondas sísmicas</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
